channel.title: The system cannot find the path specified
channel.description: ok my complier works fine. i edited it by putting "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" ClientFiles/*.java into it. i put the same thing in my runserver and it says "the system cannot find the path specified" can anyone help me fix that?

item.title: The system cannot find the path specified
item.dc:creator: @Onono6 Onono6
item.description:
@Onono6 wrote:

i put that in my runserver. and when i keep clicking it, it keeps going off and on. like blinking.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 09, 2008, 07:56:46 pm[/size][hr]wait it says. “java” is not reconized as a internal or external command

Read full topic
item.source: The system cannot find the path specified

Just follow what Storm said, He’s the ownage at this O_O

item.source: The system cannot find the path specified

item.title: The system cannot find the path specified
item.dc:creator: @Onono6 Onono6
item.description:
@Onono6 wrote:

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%; is classpath

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_7\bin is my path

Read full topic
item.source: The system cannot find the path specified

item.title: The system cannot find the path specified
item.dc:creator: @stormcutter stormcutter
item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

Thats not what you put in your runserver.

Change it to this.

@echo off title whatever you want java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Read full topic
